extraction_metadata.notes: CRITICAL HIGH VALUE: 3 ETH wallets extracted, $261K+ combined loss from 2 victims. Unique tactic: Francis used rental property inquiry as entry point. Victim 1 liquidated 401K and borrowed on credit card. Platform used ERC-20 maintenance and offshore tax excuses. Follow-up phishing emails sent after initial extraction.

chain_of_thought.step_1_initial_contact: Francis: rental property inquiry; Female scammer: random contact with wealth display
chain_of_thought.step_2_trust_building: Months of conversation (Francis); Luxury car/apartment photos (female)
chain_of_thought.step_3_platform_introduction: Introduced YoBitPro with 25% ETH return promise
chain_of_thought.step_4_initial_investment: Small trades showing promised returns to build confidence
chain_of_thought.step_5_escalation: Pressured to invest larger amounts from retirement and credit
chain_of_thought.step_6_extraction_block: Account disabled, offshore tax demand, follow-up phishing for more funds
